name: CQ_Analytics.ClientContextUI
doc:
Client Context UI object: manages rendering, show / hide...
This class is a singleton and cannot ...

props.name: ClientContextUI.CONTENT_ID
props.doc: <static> UI default Client Context content id

props.name: SHOW_BOX_COOKIE
props.doc: <static> Name of the cookie that stores if CC should be displayed or not on page load

methods.name: ClientContextUI.create
methods.doc: <static> Creates and inits the Client Context UI.

methods.name: hide
methods.doc:
Hides the UI.
Fires "beforehide" and "hide" events.

methods.name: isAvailable
methods.doc: Returns if UI is available: true if some content is load into the UI box.

methods.name: load
methods.doc:
Loads the Client Context content. If already loaded, will not be loaded again until force is set
...

methods.name: onLoad
methods.doc: Helper method to register an on load event. Checks if the Client Context has already been loaded.

methods.name: render
methods.doc:
Renders the UI.
Fires "beforerender" and "render" events.

methods.name: show
methods.doc:
Shows the UI. Loads the Client Context and renders the UI if not already done.
Fires "beforeshow"...
